amendment.description: An amendment to prohibit funds from being used to suspend, modify, or waive any provision of law under chapter 43, 71, 75, or 77 of title 5, United States Code, or any regulations promulgated under those provisions of law.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Inslee amendment was withdrawn.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Inslee.
